interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: TCM Mancode 101 Men's Hair Conditioner 16oz
Review Date: 2020/10/27
Store: TCM
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'TCM', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'UPC': '851058008421'}
Review Text: The "TCM Mancode 101 Men's Hair Conditioner" has a very nice scent, not overpowering just right. I had my husband try the conditioner following all the direction. The directions have you shampooing your hair and towel dry, then taking a palm sized amount to massage ( I think that is more than you need) from ends to scalp. Then comb with wide tooth comb from the scalp upward to the ends and let it stay in for 5 minutes ( this is a negative to me ...5 minutes waiting is too long). Finally rinse thoroughly and style. It is infused with tea tree oil and Chia seed oil. My husband agreed with my thoughts on amount of product and time. He thought it was just okay, nothing fantastic. The product comes in a metal container - the one I received not dings and creases on the outside but no damage in the inside of container.
Review Title: Nice Scent
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce
Bioré
['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.']
{'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'}
The Bioré Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is slightly like a watery jelly texture and goes on smoothly for washing away dirt and makeup on your face. You simply pump some of the cleaner in the palm of your hand and then massage it gently on your face to clear away the makeup -  then rinse your whole face with water. The scent is mild but very nice. When finished you will not feel any sticky residue. I love the guard on the pump that allows you to put it on the pump when you are not using it so little fingers cannot spread the jelly around when you are not looking nor can the pump squirt out when the bottle falls over or when you are traveling. This product was made in Japan.
Love The Guard For The Cap
Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce
Bioré
['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.']
{'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'}
Biore Cleansing Oil Makeup Removing Cloths come in a package like most wipes and have a pull tab on the top to open and close the packet. There are 44 wipes in each packet and each wipe is about 4.5 x 5.5 inches (you probably would need 2 or 3 wipes a time if you wear a lot of makeup) and is pre-moisturized. These wipes are to be deposed in the garbage not the toilet and are not to be close to your eyes. Directions state that you should place the cloth on the area that has make-up for about 5 seconds and then wipe off. The scent smells very nice and my skin did feel smooth when done. This product was made in Japan
Nice Case For Traveling
MAD | Cosmetic's Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Daily cleansing face wipes to remove waterproof mascara, alcohol free , with Vitamin E 25 count
JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD
{'Brand': 'JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Unit Count': '25.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 7.87 x 1.97 inches; 7.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '685757511926'}
These  "Cosmetic's Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes" are about 7.5 inches by 6.5 Inches  and the fabric is sturdy and also a bit stretchy. It is difficult trying to get the wipes out of the package as the opening is too small. These wipes are slightly scented and I found the scent to not be pleasant. Once I had the wipe in my hands and on my face I could not get rid of the smell - not even when I washed both hands and face with my favorite body gel - there was still a bit of the wipe's fragrance. The wipes are infused with Vitamin E and made with Argan oil and Hyaluronic. This product is alcohol free and is moistened to just the right level so it not dripping when taken out the package. Do not dispose these in the toilet. I think this product is made in Hong Kong but not sure of that.
Do Not Dispose In Toilet
TCM Mancode 101 Men's Hair Conditioner 16oz

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary**

- **Preferred Product Type:** Focuses on makeup removers and cleansers, favoring gentle, non-greasy options that are effective yet moisturizing, while also showing interest in hair care products, particularly conditioners.
- **Quality Indicators:** Values products that thoroughly cleanse without residue and emphasize moisturizing properties, extending to hair care where effectiveness in conditioning is important.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Prefers mild and pleasant scents; however, recent experiences have led to increased sensitivity to stronger fragrances, prompting a reassessment of fragrance tolerances, noted in both skincare and hair care products.
- **Texture Preference:** Appreciates lightweight formulations with unique textures, such as jelly consistencies, enhancing user experience across different product types, including conditioners.
- **Product Features:** Seeks practical features like protective packaging for convenience and safety, especially in homes with children, and prefers ease of access in both skincare and hair care products.
- **Cultural Influences:** Maintains a strong inclination towards Japanese products, reflecting a preference for J-Beauty standards and innovations, while also exploring other brands.
- **Satisfaction Standards:** Looks for products with high satisfaction ratings that deliver effective and user-friendly designs. Recent interactions illustrate an ongoing engagement with beauty and personal care products, with mixed experiences informing future choices, especially regarding conditioning times and usability in hair care products.
